introduction_id: Kamera PTZ Cerdas Dual-Mode Maxvision Al mengadopsi desain arsitektur dual-mode, algoritma pembelajaran mendalam Al terintegrasi, kolaborasi binokular, mempertimbangkan detail, cakupan panorama penuh, mencakup berbagai pemandangan seperti orang, kendaraan, jalan, dll., secara komprehensif memenuhi kebutuhan spesifik industri.
description_en:
Maxvision Al Dual-Mode Intelligent PTZ Camera adopts dual-mode architecture design, built-in Al deep learning algorithm, binocular collaboration, taking into account details, full
panoramic coverage, covering various scenes such as people, vehicles, roads, etc., comprehensively meet the specific needs of the industry.
introduction_en:
Maxvision Al Dual-Mode Intelligent PTZ Camera adopts dual-mode architecture design, built-in Al deep learning algorithm, binocular collaboration, taking into account details, full
panoramic coverage, covering various scenes such as people, vehicles, roads, etc., comprehensively meet the specific needs of the industry.

parameter_id.label: Berat
parameter_id.value: Berat keseluruhan mesin 7,6 kg; Berat kemasan 9,4 kg
